company_info.Company Description: Black Moon HR Consultancy Services, a Strong in Manpower Recruitment Industry provides End-to-End Recruitment Solutions for all varieties of Industries.

jd_information.description: We are looking Travel Consultant for a Coimbatore Location,  as per details given below.  Position : Travel Consultant - OperationsQualifications : Any degreeMonthly Salary : Rs. 10,000 to 20,000 Brief Job Description : Packaging, ticketing, operation works, sales & marketing   Kindly forward your updated CV to nila@blackmoonhr.com you are interested on the above requirement.  Rrgards NILA.G
